website_summaries.verdict: Safety balls with a soft exterior that are perfect for youngsters just learning to catch.
pros: Even though this is a soft-sided baseball, it has a realistic weight, size, and feel with raised steams that allow kids to learn to throw the ball properly and safely
You can hit this ball just as you would a standard baseball
More durable than a typical safety style of baseball
cons: Really only made for very young t-ball players

customer_reviews.title: Good for Learning
customer_reviews.text: My son seems to be less butt-hurt when these hit his face.
customer_reviews.author: Andersh Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Softer than the Macgregor kids level one baseballs.
customer_reviews.text: These are great balls for kids starting out at baseball. They are actually softer and more squishy than the level one Macgregor kids level one balls. They are a step between a level one ball (Macgregor level one balls) and a light soft foam baseball. These are great because they are the similar weight to a real hard baseball (also similar weight to the Macgregor level one baseballs) but they are much softer. My son got hit in face after missing a catch and it did not faze him. It keeps him from being scared of the ball. I would highly recommend as a safe practice ball for any kid, especially a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: MrQ

customer_reviews.title: Great training baseballs for a 6-9 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old son begged me to get these balls after he used them in our town's recreational baseball program. They are not too soft but also not as hard as big league balls. They are a good compromise. If your child is still a novice and wants a good ball for easing into "big kid" baseball, this is a good ball. Very throwable. Very hittable. Not soft like a Nerf, but also not so hard as to put a kid down if he/she gets inadvertently hit while playing. I plan to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Practice Ball that is Too Soft and Too Light for Tee-Ball
customer_reviews.text: Really soft baseball/tee-ball. Honestly, I think they are too soft and too light weight for Tee-Ball. The official Tee-Balls you can buy at a Sporting Goods shop have a little squish to them, but still a descent weight for hitting and throwing. These are really soft and light. They might be good for a complete beginner, if you're more worried about them getting hurt. They might be good for backyard practice if you are worried about breaking windows. They are a step up from completely squishy sponge balls that you use with a toddler. But I don't think they are adequate enough for Tee-Ball.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Effective training tools
customer_reviews.text: My son is not afraid when we practice pop-ups, because these balls are covered in an extra layer of foam, they hit like real baseballs but our safer for my 6 year old to learn with
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gildein

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning to play ball....
customer_reviews.text: These balls are the same size as a baseball but softer. I bought a box to keep at my house for my grandsons and my son asked if he could keep the box for his son. It’s nice when they are just starting to learn to ground balls or go after pop ups, not so hard if they get hit!
customer_reviews.author: Richard & Karen McPhail

customer_reviews.title: Great ball but.....
customer_reviews.text: These balls are really meant for youth players and not meant to be hit hard. They feel like a soft foam inside and leatherette outside. I was hoping they would be a bit more solid. However for t-ball practice, catching and throwing drills they are excellent but don’t think they will withstand several hard hits. I would highly recommend for t ballers.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Teaching my toddler how to play, and these are perfect. They’re soft enough to get hit by and not hurt. Kind of expensive though if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Cjannellv

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad bit softer than a real baseball.
customer_reviews.text: From the descriptions and reviews that I read, I was under the impression that these would be a bit more soft, lightweight, and almost "sponge-like". They're pretty firm, but not as hard or unforgiving as a real baseball would be when playing catch.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. The ball's softness is just right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The ball's softness is just right, not too hard but not too squishy. I have another popular safety ball in my bag, but I always reach for this one when pitching to my kids. It has a good weight too it and feel for catching/throwing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dsy0610

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls! :)
customer_reviews.text: These balls are perfect for my 5 year old starting t-ball! She's not afraid of them, and she's really liked practicing with them so far :) customer service has been superior and awesome. 10/10 recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good for backyard baseball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because we need a ball that won’t break anything when we play baseball in the backyard. These kids hit hard, and no damage so far, so that sounds like a win!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. They go over concrete regularly and have very few snagged spots because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for kids
customer_reviews.text: So far these balls are holding up great for my toddlers, my father in law really smacked one of the tee and it is still in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Falkenstein

customer_reviews.title: Flex-Ball
customer_reviews.text: The best ball hands down for youths just learning to play T/Baseball. 5 stars +++++
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: They love them! They're sturdy enough so they don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the dogs to play with. They love them! They're sturdy enough so they don't get torn apart, but are slightly soft/squishy so I'm not afraid of her breaking a tooth. Wish we could find these in softball size because she can fit 3 in her mouth at once :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for tball
customer_reviews.text: Great for playing catch and hitting. Has held up well for my 5 year old who is in t-ball. Not sure how it would hold up to an older child who hits the ball really hard but for 5-6 years old it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and softer than the real thing... however, these can still hurt or break if they hit you/object.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers to play indoors
customer_reviews.text: Great product form my 3 year old grandson to play indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Snuffy

customer_reviews.title: Great baseballs
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old son loves these baseballs. They are perfect for beginners or advanced players alike. Great for playing in the yard or taking to the ball field. They hold up well and make for nice practice balls.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice basball for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right firmness to simulate a real baseball while reducing the worry of the little guys getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safety Tee Balls
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as part of a birthday gift for our great-grandson. Seem well-made and just right for him to use. He's five years old.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little t-baller! Soft enough that when he doesn't catch it and it hits him in the chest he doesn't cry but hard enough that it's still a baseball.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, softer ball for younger kids to help prevent injuries but not super light so it won’t carry when hit.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestMom99

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: It’s always be a reliable brand, my go to. I’m glad we were able to find them so easily. My son and husband really like them. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Good balls.
customer_reviews.text: Great balls. Soft feel so my son feels safe when learning. Good weight (standard baseball weight), well made. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: ... thoguht these were kind of expensive but they are great for any child learning to play ball - nice ...
customer_reviews.text: It thoguht these were kind of expensive but they are great for any child learning to play ball - nice and soft and not going to hurt anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Erbo

customer_reviews.title: Safe and great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 5 year old who is just learning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my application. It has similar weight to a regulation baseball and the padding makes it very safe from even fast impacts.
customer_reviews.author: Zinger

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for teaching
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great for teaching my son how to throw and catch. He misjudged a couple of balls I threw which ended up hitting him and due the soft padding he wasn't even phased.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Soft baseball
customer_reviews.text: Good product for beginning t-ball players; small like a baseball but softer so the kids won't be hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome training balls used them to teach catch with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome training balls used them to teach catch with the 4yo and to teach lacrosse with the 9yo
customer_reviews.author: rex rehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls. Just what my son needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls. Just what my son needed. I dont know your life, but these balls are soft and white.
customer_reviews.author: Richs_vw_bus

customer_reviews.title: They feel perfect
customer_reviews.text: We just got these in and the feel and weight is perfect and the ball itself is not too soft but soft enough...
customer_reviews.author: Albert Kookesh

customer_reviews.title: These balls are great and a good value on Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great and a good value on Amazon Prime. They are similar to the t-balls that are used in our t-ball league. Good weight and a little soft so the kids don't get hurt if the ball hits them on the head/face.
customer_reviews.author: Pailin C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for Tball and safe for 4 year old. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It’s better than expect
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually kinda hard but soft at the same time. Which is an awesome thing tho
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far these are great! We gave them to my son as part ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great! We gave them to my son as part of his birthday gift, he opened them today and played with them for about 3 hours! He got hit in the face with one of them and it didn't seem to hurt much at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Knippen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to practice throwing in doors. Not too bouncy just the right amount of softness. Definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: HMA1220

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves them. They were just what we were looking for. Seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: ERFsweet

customer_reviews.title: Great baseball for Tball
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my son to play and practice baseball,
customer_reviews.author: Icstars06

customer_reviews.title: Not so much "ouch"
customer_reviews.text: Great. Grandkids not so fearful and not breaking into tears when bumped with a ball. Balls are wearing well to this point - 2 weeks. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H.

customer_reviews.title: Proven to be great item for beginners to t-ball.
customer_reviews.text: Soft enough to feel a sense of safety for my child. Quality item also.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for great grandson who is starting to play t ball. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My boys, 6 and 9, love the look and feel. I like that they are not going to kill each other with them!
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Beginner ball player.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Bought for my 5 year old grandson as he learns the game. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Just as they described plus ball!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Grandson loves it and won't put it down.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGANNE TREADWAY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a four year old. We are ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good feeling ball
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a real baseball yet it is still soft.
customer_reviews.author: Looee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great balls for a five year old learning to throw. Would. It again.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Haines

customer_reviews.title: The best so far!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for all your first time players out there. Really stands up to the abuse of being pitched and hit. Lasting leagues longer than other practice baseballs that I've recently purchased only to have the outside split. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: melo415

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great practice balls for my son who hits off of a tee.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carobine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This training ball after an hour and half of use was completely destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: LYL

customer_reviews.title: Look forward to teaching my son
customer_reviews.text: While I didn't even open the box and try out the balls with my 4 year old son yet, I really appreciated the message from the seller asking me if the balls met my expectations. It was that message that gave me that old feeling of home town business. In a day and age where everything is anonymous and impersonal, the message felt close to home. I look forward to teaching my son to play ball (hopefully better than me) and the qualities of being prideful and humble. If he does become the next Griffey or Ted Williams I will certainly update this review. Stay tuned
customer_reviews.author: Justin solfaro

customer_reviews.title: UPGRADE FROM TENNIS BALLS
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors kids have been using tennis balls to play baseball in their back yard. I thought it would be nice to send these over to them, so i purchased a sleeve of three. They came in quickly, they are packaged nicely, and they seem to have good quality. I have not noticed if the kids have played with these baseballs yet so I am not able to give any testimony as to how well they hold up but they appear to be a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have not had a chance to try them but they appear to be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We got them for our grandson but we have not been able to try them out due to weather. They appear to be perfect. We can't wait for a dry sunny day to set up our t-ball field and get him started.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: The package arrived just fine, has not been opened as it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived just fine, has not been opened as it is a birthday gift for my 8 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Peerenboom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for beginning/young players to learn some fundamentals without getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Faith

product_meta.title: Precision Impact Flex-Ball: Low Impact Safety Tee Balls for Kids Indoor Baseball or Outdoor Baseball (3-Pack)
product_meta.description:
SPECIFICATIONS
Circumference: 8.8"
Weight: 4.5oz or 120g
Qty: 3
Features: Raised Seams, Flexible core, Low Impact
feature_bullets: SAFETY AND PLAYER CONFIDENCE: Training correctly and working hard is key to any beginner's development, but we believe that having FUN and being INJURY FREE is even more important. With Precision Impact's Flex-Balls, kids ages 4-7 can develop the ability to throw and catch baseballs with more confidence with less fear of injury.

REALISTIC FEEL: Besides the "flexibility" of the ball, every other aspect of the ball is nearly identical to a real baseball including weight, size, surface feel, and raised seams. They're great for playing Tee Ball also!

HOW FLEXIBLE ARE THE BALLS? By no means are Flex-Balls "soft"; a direct hit to the groin will no doubt send even the toughest down to their knees, but they do compress more than a standard baseball. They are similar in firmness to a toned, flexed muscle.

PREMIUM QUALITY & ODOR FREE: Precision Impact Flex-Balls are made of a rubber core with a polyurethane (PU) cover which is of much higher durability than typical PVC leather that most other manufacturers use. Further, our processes do not coat the leather with dangerous and awful smelling chemicals which exists on other brands. Keep your team and loved ones safe from dangerous and toxic materials.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Precision Impact Flex-Balls come with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Our customer service is dedicated to addressing any product/service issues and is committed to delivering a 5 star experience for all buyers. If you're not happy with our product, simply return it for a full refund. You really have nothing to lose!
